verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Down in the valley with my Saviour I would go, Where the flowers are blooming and the sweet waters flow; Everywhere He leads me I will follow, follow on, Walking in His footsteps till the crown be won.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Follow! follow! I will follow Jesus! Anywhere, everywhere, I will follow on! Follow! follow! I will follow Jesus! Everywhere He leads me I will follow on!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Down in the valley with my Saviour I would go, Where the storms are sweeping and the dark waters flow; With His hand to lead me I will never, never fear, Danger cannot fright me if my Lord is near.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Down in the valley or upon the mountain steep, Close beside my Saviour would my soul ever keep; He will lead me safely in the path that He has trod, Up to where they gather on the hills of God.
